import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import "./reserve.css" import { faCircleXmark } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch" const Reserve = ({ setOpen, hotelId }) => { const [selectedRooms, setSelectedRooms] = useState([]); const { data, loading, error } = useFetch(`/hotels/room/${hotelId}`) const handleSelect = (e) => { const checked = e.target.checked const value = e.target.value setSelectedRooms(prev => (checked ? [... selectedRooms, value] : selectedRooms.filter(item => item !== value))) } return (
setOpen(false)} /> Select your rooms {data.map(item => (
{item.title}
{item.desc}
Max people: {item.maxPeople}
{item.price}
{item.roomNumbers.map(roomNumber => (
))}
))}
) } export default Reserve
